title: Dual Beam Environmental Scanning Electron Microscopy for Novel Applications in the Life Sciences
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The development of the technology of using dual beam ESEM/FIB instrumentation has been useful for the community including industry. Interactions with Unilever and Nestle, for instance, explored the potential for the instrumentation for foods. Unfortunately it was found to be not very suitable due to beam-heating artefacts. Agriculture, Food and Drink Economic
